JobFullDesc: The Client Solutions Manager for Facebook’s Global Marketing Solutions team partners with our most strategic clients to make sure they are successful with Facebook. This is an outstanding opportunity to be at the center of some of Facebook's most important commercial relationships in the MENA region/portfolio. The Client Solutions Manager is a strategic solution-driver who puts customers at the core of everything they do. This role is responsible for building strategic partnerships, driving growth, advertiser education, and satisfaction in innovative ways, and leveraging data-driven insights for our customers. You should have a deep passion for Facebook and the overall marketing ecosystem.Success in this position requires strong consultative sales and analytical skills, being comfortable working with large data sets to identify performance patterns and translate into solutions, working with internal cross-functional partners, and the ability to thrive in a dynamic, team-focused environment delivering against tight deadlines.This role will be located in our Dubai office.At Facebook, supporting our employees is a core part of how we do business. From our generous benefits to our robust diversity programs, we’re focused on empowering all our employees to live life to the fullest and bring their best selves to work, each and every day. We’re proud of our supportive and inclusive culture and our International Headquarter benefits from over 100 different nationalities. We are dedicated to making Facebook welcoming to everyone who comes to work with us and we actively seek to recruit people with different backgrounds and experiences to help us build better products,
